SQLDataSource.Author: DELL
SQLDataSource.Name: MONITORED_ACTIVE_USERS
SQLDataSource.Where: mch_code IN (SELECT mch_code FROM (SELECT a.mch_code, a.contract, NVL(&AO.C_Ea_Customization_Util_API.Get_Identity(a.mch_code, a.contract), '') AS identity, &AO.C_Ea_Customization_Util_API.Get_Contract_Id(a.mch_code, a.contract) As contract_id FROM &AO.equipment_functional_uiv a, &AO.service_user_status_clv b WHERE a.mch_code = b.cf$_mch_code AND a.contract = b.cf$_contract AND a.obj_level = '360_SERVICE_USER' AND b.cf$_service_user_status = 'Active' AND b.cf$_monitored = 'True') WHERE &AO.Sc_Service_Contract_API.Get_Contract_Type(contract_id) = 'MS' AND REPLACE(NVL(contract_id, ' '), ' ', '%') LIKE REPLACE(NVL('$CONTRACT_ID$', ' '), ' ', '%') AND REPLACE(NVL(&AO.Crm_Cust_Info_API.Get_Main_Representative_Id(identity), ' '), ' ', '%') LIKE REPLACE(NVL('$REGION_REPRESENTATIVE$', ' '), ' ', '%'))
